Press Releases | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Tesla Third Quarter 2025 Production, Deliveries &amp; Deployments Business Wire Oct 2, 2025 AUSTIN, Texas, October 2, 2025 – In the third quarter, we produced over 447,000 vehicles, delivered over 497,000 vehicles and deployed 12.5 GWh of energy storage products – a record for both deliveries and deployments. Continue Reading Tesla Releases Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results Business Wire Jul 23, 2025 AUSTIN, Texas, July 23, 2025 – Tesla has released its financial results for the second quarter of 2025 by posting an update on its Investor Relations website. Please visit https://ir.tesla.com to view the update. Continue Reading Tesla Second Quarter 2025 Production, Deliveries &amp; Deployments Business Wire Jul 2, 2025 AUSTIN, Texas, July 2, 2025 – In the second quarter, we produced over 410,000 vehicles, delivered over 384,000 vehicles and deployed 9.6 GWh of energy storage products. Continue Reading Tesla Releases First Quarter 2025 Financial Results Business Wire Apr 22, 2025 AUSTIN, Texas, April 22, 2025 – Tesla has released its financial results for the first quarter of 2025 by posting an update on its Investor Relations website. Please visit https://ir.tesla.com to view the update. Continue Reading Tesla First Quarter 2025 Production, Deliveries &amp; Deployments Business Wire Apr 2, 2025 AUSTIN, Texas, April 2, 2025 – In the first quarter, we produced over 362,000 vehicles, delivered over 336,000 vehicles and deployed 10.4 GWh of energy storage products.
